form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Classify Status or Alien Relative for Issuance of Immigrant Visa, Form 1-30

full_text: Screened by NARA 2/10/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB NO 43- RO 401 PETITION TO Fee Stamp CLASSIFY STATUS PLEASE NOTE YOU ARE THE PETITIONER ALIEN RELATIVE FOR JUL 8 - 1981 AND YOUR RELATIVE ISSUANCE OF IS THE MIGRANT VISA BENEFICIARY COS 446820 1.
